name: Climate Crisis: A Nation in Peril
name_original: Climate Crisis: A Nation in Peril
description:
Countries all around the world are facing severe impacts from climate change, such as more frequent and intense storms, droughts, and heat waves. The American public begins to feel anxious as their impending doom slowly approaches. As the President of the United States of America, you must make decisions about how to address the climate crisis and protect your people, as well as how to prevent further damage.

Cover photo created with AI art (DALL-E).

Created for Unit 2 Major Project for Mr. Thew's UWHS 131 class.
